summary:
Ability to evaluate sound business opportunities, resolve conflicts. Naturally takes ownership to go above and beyond in addressing a client/end user’s concern. Excellent communication, interpersonal, negotiation, presentation, client and time management skills

Delivered excellent customer service and sales skills which resulted being consistent top sales agent performer of team and whole program that consists of 500 individuals

Coached Regional Sales and Marketing Team to achieve revenue growth of 39% in 2017 and 49% in 2018, winning best sales coach award in 2018.

Successfully maintaining a career-long record of consistently meeting and surpassing sales quotas while earning continual recognition, awards, and bonuses for top sales performance and customer service.
Strategizing new business opportunities, achieving product expertise, and creating key customer and supplier relationships define my career accomplishments. My experience in prospecting and securing new accounts—while consistently providing exceptional client service and boosting the bottom line—positions me to surpass even your highest sales objectives.

•	Strong working experience in Project Management and ITILv4 Management and Practices using proper ITSM tools

courses.name: ITIL 4  Foundation Complete Course & 8 Practice Exams by Dion Training
Linkedin Generation Machine: Cold Email B2B Sales Master Course
Linkedin Marketing Lead Generation & B2B Sales for Linkedin
PRINCE2 Project Management Foundation Complete Course & 2 Practice Exams by Dion Training

profile_positions.description:
* Meet or exceed sales and product objectives
* Effectively qualify leads and identify prospect needs, engaging technical resources as required
* Create client demos/ presentations, quotes/ proposals, and Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs)
* Conduct high-level conversations with C-Level and VP -Level Executives to address business needs
* Utilize solution-selling techniques to effectively guide sales process to close
* Develop and maintain business within existing accounts, manage complex sales situations and sales campaigns
* Upsell and leverage business from new and established customer relationships
* Utilize Salesforce CRM to provide timely and accurate sales activity tracking and status updates
* Work strategically with management to deliver forecasts, identify trending opportunities/challenges, and provide recommended solutions
* Forecast sales activity and revenue achievement while creating satisfied customers
* Resolve client issues in a timely and thorough manner; escalates issues to manager as appropriate
* Keep informed of product line, competition and industry trends that may impact client business activities
profile_positions.title: Small Business Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
* Utilize Salesforce, cold calls, and email to generate new sales opportunities
* Identify the needs of prospects, and suggest appropriate products or services
* Build long-term, trusting relationships with prospects to qualify leads as sales opportunities
* Proactively seek new business opportunities in the market
* Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) customers and sales executives
* Create client demos/ presentations, quotes/ proposals, and Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs)
* Conduct high-level conversations with C-Level and VP -Level Executives to address business needs
* Utilize solution-selling techniques to effectively guide sales process to close
* Develop and maintain business within existing accounts, manage complex sales situations and sales campaigns
profile_positions.title: Online Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
o	Manage assigned incidents and requests according to end user computing SLAs, hardware and software break fix, installations and changes, new systems and releases.
o	Convey troubleshooting steps and information to end users via phone calls and email. 
o	Troubleshoot technical problems and properly documenting all incident requests in a ticketing system
o	Provide support for all IT related needs such as software, hardware installations, support, troubleshooting
 
Significant Highlights
o	Consistently delivered excellent customer service skills and immediate incident resolution which led to consistent 98% customer satisfaction from 92% passing score and consistent 98% of first call incident resolution from 80% passing score
o	Collaborated with team and operations managers to implement a role-based assignment practice for all team members to balance team members’ workload and teamwork which improved meet SLA by clients and stakeholders
o	Contributed with building program’s knowledge base from scratch as newly started program acquired by Wipro Philippines
profile_positions.title: Information Technology Service Desk

profile_positions.description:
o	Mentoring new salespeople, designing individual and team training courses and preparing educational material.
o	Researching competitors’ products, pricing, and product success to determine customer preferences.
o	Developing innovative sales strategies to achieve sales goals.
o	Design training courses using gamification, role-playing activities and job simulation
o	Gather feedback on all training programs from trainees, managers and instructors
o	Set annual learning and development objectives for the sales team
o	Maintain updated records of educational curriculum and material
o	Evaluate employees’ performance after each training
o	Monitor costs of training programs
profile_positions.title: Senior Sales Representative/ Sales Coach

profile_positions.description:
SALES SPECIALIST  			
o	Present and sell company products and services to current and potential customers.
o	Develop new business opportunities through strategic outreach
o	Meet target quota related to number of qualified opportunities, value of sales pipeline, and closed business.
o	Report, track, and manage sales activities and results using Salesforce.com
o	Provide customers with order verification, updates on delivery dates, product availability and pricing.
o	Coordinate and assist Shipping to prepare appropriate shipping and trade compliance documentation, work closely with shipping partners to ensure timely delivery.

Significant highlights 
o	Delivered excellent customer service and sales skills which resulted being consistent top sales agent performer of team and whole program that consists of 500 individuals. Consistently part of top 10 Sales Specialist of the program.
o	Consistently passed all the metrics or quotas every month despite of the changes in quota every quarter.
o	Promoted as a Sales Coach/ Senior Sales of the program in less than a year.
o	Coached Regional Sales and Marketing Team to achieve revenue growth of 39% in 2017 and 49% in 2018, winning best sales coach award in 2018.
profile_positions.title: Sales Specialist

profile_positions.description:
o	Conveys software and hardware troubleshooting to existing customers through chat (2 sessions at a time). 
o	Aid with general inquiry and billing queries of existing customers
o	Coordinate shipping schedules of products that are fulfilled for replacement or repair
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Specialist
